body: Great simple enjoyable story, good art, not annoyingly long or short, hot characters, nothing weird, this is a good old fashion loli hmanga nothing fancy but some solid good shit 👌
Great Job malis and also the to allthefallen team.

http://translations.allthefallen.ninja/
Twitter: @Allthefallen1

A girl’s skewed fashion sense unveils a rare opportunity.. This is our third commission release that I have the pleasure of publishing.

If you want to make more lolis or shotas appear, consider commissioning us! Our rates are reasonable and we pride ourself on delivering quality work.

https://translations.allthefallen.ninja/?page_id=872
